Beverage category requires careful consideration of various architectural aspects to ensure scalability, reliability, and maintainability. Here's a detailed look at the key components and design decisions:"}],["$","p","1",{"className":"mb-4","children":"## System Requirements"}],["$","p","2",{"className":"mb-4","children":"1. **Scalability**: The system must handle millions of orders and search requests\n    2. **Performance**: Search operations should complete within 500ms\n    3. **Data Integrity**: No loss of transactional data\n    4. **Real-time Updates**: Live order tracking and notifications"}],["$","p","3",{"className":"mb-4","children":"## Architecture Components"}],["$","p","4",{"className":"mb-4","children":"### Frontend Layer\n    - Web and mobile applications\n    - Real-time order tracking interface\n    - Restaurant menu management dashboard"}],["$","p","5",{"className":"mb-4","children":"### API Layer\n    - RESTful services for CRUD operations\n    - WebSocket connections for real-time updates\n    - GraphQL endpoints for flexible data querying"}],["$","p","6",{"className":"mb-4","children":"### Service Layer\n    - Order Processing Service\n    - Payment Gateway Integration\n    - Notification Service\n    - Search and Recommendation Engine"}],["$","p","7",{"className":"mb-4","children":"### Data Layer\n    - PostgreSQL for transactional data\n    - Elasticsearch for menu and search functionality\n    - Redis for caching and real-time data\n    - Kafka for event streaming"}],["$","p","8",{"className":"mb-4","children":"## Key Design Decisions"}],["$","p","9",{"className":"mb-4","children":"1. **Microservices Architecture**: Enables independent scaling and deployment\n    2. **Event-Driven Design**: Facilitates real-time updates and system decoupling\n    3. **CQRS Pattern**: Separates read and write operations for better performance\n    4. **Domain-Driven Design**: Organizes business logic into bounded contexts"}]]}]]}]}]}]}]]}],null]]},["$","$L4",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","blog","children","$5","children"],"loading":"$undefined","loadingStyles":"$undefined","loadingScripts":"$undefined","hasLoading":false,"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L6",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}]]},["$","$L4",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","blog","children"],"loading":"$undefined","loadingStyles":"$undefined","loadingScripts":"$undefined","hasLoading":false,"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L6",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}]]},[null,["$","html",null,{"lang":"en","suppressHydrationWarning":true,"children":["$","body",null,{"className":"__variable_e8ce0c
